name: eMAZE
description:
hi this is my first project after 2 months of learning unreal engine...everything that i learned i applied on that project. so this is just the beginning but i would like to know your feedback on this prototype and here are some points that you can consider when giving your feedback:

-did you notice any glitches in the game ?(other than the ones listed below)

-did you enjoy the game?

-do you have any ideas to improve the game ?

-anything that comes to your mind just say it to me 

i'm also looking for someone who can create assets and animations  in the same level as me (beginner/low intermediate) to help and encourage  each others to create more projects.

known glitches:

1-Saving then loading the game resets the pickups(heal,shields..etc)

2-mountains shadows not whole

3-changing volume in main menu doesn't change the in game volume

4-after completing the game and loading a save game all gems are always taken

but works fine for new game 

really hope to hear from you all after you try the game
